PHRASE.LANG: Yoko Ono had first performed ‘A Grapefruit In The World Of Park’ in 1961, and in 1964 published a book called ‘Grapefruit: A Book Of Instructions And Drawings’, which she sent to John Lennon three years later. John Lennon wore the T-shirt while at a book signing at Selfridges in London, UK, in July 1971. Lennon had written an introduction for the re-issue of the book, which he had kept by his bedside after Ono sent it to him. [#Legal]

Yoko Ono interpréta "A Grapefruit In The World Of Park" en 1961 et publia, en 1964, un livre intitulé "Grapefruit: A Book Of Instructions And Drawings" qu'elle envoya à John Lennon trois années plus tard. John Lennon porta le t-shirt lors d'une séance de dédicace chez Selfridges à Londres, en juillet 1971. Lennon est l'auteur de la préface de la réédition de ce livre, qui n'a jamais quitté son chevet. [#Legal]

Yoko Ono war mit „A Grapefruit In The World of Park“ zuerst im Jahre 1961 aufgetreten, und 1964 brachte sie dann ein Buch mit dem Titel „Grapefruit: A Book Of Instructions And Drawings“ heraus, das sie drei Jahre später an John Lennon schickte. John Lennon trug das T-Shirt im Juli 1971 während einer Signierstunde für das Buch bei Selfridges in London (UK). Lennon hatte eine Einleitung für die Neuauflage des Buches geschrieben, das er neben seinem Bett aufbewahrte, nachdem Ono es ihm geschickt hatte. [#Legal]

Yoko Ono aveva cantato "A Grapefruit In The World Of Park" per la prima volta nel 1961 e nel 1964 pubblicò un libro dal titolo "Grapefruit: A Book Of Instructions And Drawings" che inviò a John Lennon tre anni più tardi. John Lennon indossava la T-shirt mentre firmava autografi in un grande magazzino di Londra, nel luglio 1971. Lennon aveva scritto un'introduzione per la seconda edizione del libro, che aveva sempre tenuto sul comodino da quando Yoko glielo aveva mandato. [#Legal]

Yoko Ono interpretó por primera vez “A Grapefruit In The World Of Park” en 1961 y en 1964 publicó un libro llamado “Pomelo: libro de instrucciones + dibujos”, que envió a John Lennon tres años después. John Lennon llevó la camiseta mientras firmaba libros en Selfridges, Londres, en julio de 1971. Lennon había escrito una introducción a la reedición del libro, que siempre tenía en la mesilla de noche después de que Ono se lo enviara. [#Legal]

Yoko Ono had first performed ‘A Grapefruit In The World Of Park’ in 1961, and in 1964 published a book called ‘Grapefruit: A Book Of Instructions And Drawings’, which she sent to John Lennon three years later. John Lennon wore the T-shirt while at a book signing at Selfridges in London, UK, in July 1971. Lennon had written an introduction for the re-issue of the book, which he had kept by his bedside after Ono sent it to him. [#Legal]

Lennon had written an introduction for the re-issue of the book, which he had kept by his bedside after Ono sent it to him. [#Legal]
